title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4230.5 - Linked deposits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4230.5 - Linked deposits

State Regulations
(a) The
corporation may make linked deposits of funds into eligible banking
organizations in order to encourage such organizations to make small loans to
minority and women-owned business enterprises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4230.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
